game.name: Action Taimanin
game.genres: Action, Adventure, RPG, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, In-App Purchases, Partial Controller Support, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet
game.shortDescription: 초인 닌자 특무중대를 통솔하여, 악의 세력에 맞서 싸워라! 대마인 시리즈의 매력적인 캐릭터들이 선보이는 근미래 닌자 액션 RPG!
game.shortDescriptionEn: An intense, gorgeous hack-and-slash action RPG from the Taimanin fame!

reviewHighlights.text: This game is shit. Downloaded it cause I thought it was porn. A good wank wasted.
The game would be "ok at best" if not for the fact even the most insignificant little thing costs real life money.
